LevelPackHandler - Class in de.stock.level
The level pack handler holds all level packs in their specific level stage (See LevelPack and Settings_Level)
and is the single point of contact for the ActionObserver if a level pack of a level stage
is needed through the method LevelPackHandler.chooseLevelPack(Integer)
LevelPackHandler() - Constructor for class de.stock.level.LevelPackHandler
 
LevelPackLoader - Class in de.stock.level
The level pack loader loads all levels through the LevelPackLoader.loadLevelPacks(URI) method.

It uses the Java Simple Plugin Framework to create and load level packs.

To create a level pack you have to follow these steps:

  1. Create your level pack and the components in a package with the following naming convention to avoid conflicts with other level packs from other developers

{country code}.{surname}.{level pack name}

For example de.lange.lemonade

  2. Create one or more classes which extend the class LevelDecorator -> This is a level

  3. Implement the conferAward() and hasPassedLevel() method

conferAward() may be used to give the player his prize for example some money

LevelPackLoader() - Constructor for class de.stock.level.LevelPackLoader
 
levelStage - Variable in class de.stock.level.Level

linkedEnvironments - Variable in class de.stock.environment.Environment
Current environment influences IEnvironment
linkEnvironment(IEnvironment) - Method in class de.stock.environment.Environment
Links environment with percentage Influence

Environment can link to environment of same type (class) or one layer above

Order from lower to upper:
Group ---> Area ---> Location
linkEnvironment(IEnvironment) - Method in interface de.stock.environment.IEnvironment
Links environment with percentage Influence

Environment can link to environment of same type (class) or one layer above

Order from lower to upper:
Group ---> Area ---> Location
linkToEnvironment(IEnvironment) - Method in interface de.stock.tradeable.ITradeable
See ITradeable.registerAtEnvironment(IEnvironment)
linkToEnvironment(IEnvironment) - Method in class de.stock.tradeable.Tradeable
 
loadEnvironments() - Method in class de.stock.environment.EnvironmentHandler
Loads all environments from directory Settings_Deserializer.PATH_ENVIRONMENTS and stores them in EnvironmentHandler.getEnvironments()
loadEvents() - Method in class de.stock.action.ActionObserver
Loads all events from directory Settings_Deserializer.PATH_EVENTS and stores them in ActionObserver.getMainEvents()
loadLevelPacks(URI) - Method in class de.stock.level.LevelPackHandler
Loads all level packs from uri through the LevelPackLoader and registers them at their specific level stage

(See Settings_Level for level stage information)
loadLevelPacks(URI) - Static method in class de.stock.level.LevelPackLoader
Loads all level packs from uri
loadTradeables() - Method in class de.stock.tradeable.TradeableHandler
Loads all tradeables from directory Settings_Deserializer.PATH_TRADEABLES and stores them in TradeableHandler.getTradeables()
Location - Class in de.stock.environment.types
A location is a type of environment and lies at the very top of the environment hierarchy

Requirements:
- Its a geographical boundary
- It has a unique proper name

Typical locations are a country like Germany, a confederation like the EU or the Sahara
Location() - Constructor for class de.stock.environment.types.Location
